quotes.quote: Someday, maybe you’ll find someone like you to share your pain with. I can’t tell you when that will happen.... But the important thing is to not reject them.

But there's nothing wrong about worrying. It's like a wall you need to overcome, to make it to the next level. If you're running up against that wall, it means you're moving forward. I wonder how many walls I've broken up until now, but if you won't move yourself, you will never get anywhere.
In the end no one's going to protect you but yourself.
They'll use you as much as they want; then once they're done with you, they'll all disappear.
We all have our scars from loving someone too deeply, from wanting to protect  someone too much.
Try relying on others once in a while. No one asks what's wrong without wanting to hear the answer.
I tried to carry on, while rejecting any relationships with others, but once you reject people, you're stuck. You lose the opportunity to meet someone and change.
It’s like a doll house. You hang out together and pretend to be friends, but when it doesn’t suit them they abandon just you.
When you trust someone and get to know them, you eventually learn about their wounds too.
